about_the_game:
Lightus is an open-world role-playing + simulation game. You will play as a traveler with no "past". When exploring the unfamiliar continent of "Theover", you can also discovering lost ruins across the world, searching for lost memories, and creating a new world together with other travelers.

——

Once you step onto the continent of Theover, your adventure begins...

——Run and explore freely across the continent of Theover.

Travel through the Wedge Rift, Serpent Creek, Oran Valley, and Misty Gorge... Immerse yourself in the lush forests, tranquil lakes, and green meadows. Feel the sunlight spread across the land, and the breeze gently brushing your face. As the sun rises and sets, and the songs of birds and the whispers of insects fill the air, craft a world that belongs to you on this land!

——Build your one-of-a-kind cozy home.

Cut down trees, break rocks, mine for resources, and collect materials to craft dozens of items. Choose from various colors and types of blocks to build your ideal structure, plant trees, grow flowers, furnish your home, and decorate the outdoors... Experience the DIY journey from an empty house to a luxurious villa!

——Free social interaction to create a popular town.

The Home Circle, an interactive feature where you can cooperate with friends to build major projects! Collaborate with friends to create theme parks, build a Ferris wheel, and more! Together, create a town full of excitement, chat daily, and enjoy the carefree life!

——Leisurely farming—one effort, one harvest.

Rise with the sun, rest with the sunset. Falling in love with the simple farming life! Fruits, vegetables, and flowers are abundant. Careful tending increases the chances of growing giant crops, striving to become the best farm owner! Different flower colors can also be refined into dyes, allowing you to dye beautiful furniture!

——Capture partners to work for you.

Tired of making furniture? No time to tend to crops? No worries! Partners are here to help! Theover is rich in species, with creatures like the Bobo the radish-head, the Armored Axe Bear, and Night Spirit the butterfly elf. Hunt and capture partners to work for you! They’ll accompany you on adventures, fight monsters, and explore Theover together!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8350 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R9 270 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid state storage is recommended

publishers: 成都世界之光科技有限公司
short_description: In Lightus, you are a traveler with no "past," embarking on an adventure across a vast world. Collect various magical creatures, challenge powerful enemies, and collaborate with other players to craft, cook, farm, rebuild the world, and create your own home to enjoy your dream life.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
